properties.situation_snapshot: 290 mpox cases (78 confirmed) across 18 regions; 180 cases (61 confirmed) in Boeny region; clade Ib outbreak monitored; one travel-associated case in Mayotte
properties.general_recommendations: Travellers should consider vaccination (when eligible), avoid close contact with symptomatic individuals, and practise good hygiene

properties.situation_snapshot: Outbreaks of Clade II monkeypox in Ghana and Liberia; cases affect both sexes with person-to-person transmission; travellers who anticipate sexual activity should consider vaccination; avoid close contact with symptomatic people and wild animals
properties.general_recommendations: Travellers should consider JYNNEOS vaccination if at higher risk and avoid contact with potentially infected individuals or animals

properties.situation_snapshot: Two confirmed cases of Nipah virus in Kolkata; both healthcare workers; outbreak response team deployed; 190 contact samples tested negative; first outbreak in West Bengal for 19 years
properties.general_recommendations: Avoid contact with sick people and bats; practise hand hygiene; travellers should seek medical care if they develop symptoms

properties.situation_snapshot: A confirmed case reported in Santa Fe; disease endemic in Buenos Aires, Cordoba, Santa Fe and La Pampa provinces; majority of cases occur during April–July harvest season
properties.general_recommendations: Travellers visiting rural endemic regions should avoid contact with rodent excreta, ensure good food storage, and consider vaccination if available

properties.situation_snapshot: Three new human cases of avian influenza A(H9N2) reported in China during 9-15 Jan 2026; cases were young children with exposure to backyard poultry or live poultry markets; all recovered; global total since 2015 is 155 cases with 2 deaths
properties.general_recommendations: Travellers should avoid contact with birds, poultry markets, and ensure foods are cooked thoroughly; practise hand hygiene

properties.situation_snapshot: 17 MERS-CoV cases reported in Saudi Arabia since 2025, with recent cases in Makkah, Riyad and Najran; travellers should avoid contact with camels and sick people
properties.general_recommendations: Avoid contact with dromedary camels and camel products, practise hand hygiene, and seek medical attention if symptoms develop

properties.situation_snapshot: Chikungunya outbreak in Sri Lanka; travellers advised to prevent mosquito bites; vaccination recommended; pregnant travellers should consider avoiding travel or discuss vaccination
properties.general_recommendations: Use mosquito repellent, wear protective clothing, stay in accommodations with screens or air conditioning, and consult a healthcare provider regarding vaccination
